scripts.dev:web:term: start "telemed-web" cmd /k "cd /d telemed-web && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:both: npm run dev:web:term && npm run dev
scripts.dev:both:powershell: powershell -NoExit -Command "Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoExit','-Command','cd telemed-web; npm run dev'; npm run dev"
scripts.dev:both:wt: powershell -Command "if (Get-Command wt -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { wt -w 0 new-tab -d telemed-web npm run dev }; npm run dev"
